end_datetime.description: The time at which the map integration ended [ISO 8601]

notice_type.description: ALEXIS has two notice types: Initial and Final.

map_duration.description: The amount of time that went into accumalating the data where the transient was found [hrs].

alpha.description: Parameterizes the statistical significance of the detection. alpha=-log10(probability_of_false_detection).

telescope_id.description: The telescope in which the transient was identified.

energy_bandpass.description: The energy bandpass associated with the telescope [eV]
